p: The statistical analysis was performed using a completely randomized design and the general linear models (GLM) procedure of SAS 9.2 ( SAS Institute, 2009). The model only included the level of supplementation. The individual rabbit was the experimental unit for all analysis. Data were analysed by one-way ANOVA. Duncan multiple range tests were used to compare means. Significance was declared at P < 0.05; P-values less than 0.001 are expressed as “<0.001” rather than the actual value. Orthogonal polynomial contrasts were also used to determine linear and quadratic effects of levels of thyme oil inclusion considering only POS (0 mg/kg thyme oils) as a control, and CON was not included in this analysis.
